clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Meptin® Swinghaler and Berotec N® Metered Aerosol in Mild to Moderate Stable Asthma Patients
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomized, Cross-over, Active-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Meptin® Swinghaler and Berotec N® Metered Aerosol in Mild to Moderate Stable Asthma Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, randomized, cross-over, active-controlled study to evaluate the efficacy and safety effects using Meptin® Swinghaler and Berotec N® Metered Aerosol in stable asthma patients

primary_outcome.measure: The change of Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) value

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of Peak Expiratory Flow Rate (PEFR)
The change of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC)

secondary_outcome.description: 5-point score of evaluation form to test preference on Meptin swinghaler/ Berotec device by investigator or patient
